scripts.test:ui: cross-env TEST_USER=$(grep TEST_USER tests/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) TEST_PASS=$(grep TEST_PASS tests/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) cypress run
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:ui
scripts.cypress:open: cross-env TEST_USER=$(grep TEST_USER tests/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) TEST_PASS=$(grep TEST_PASS tests/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) cypress open
scripts.cypress:run: cross-env TEST_USER=$(grep TEST_USER tests/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) TEST_PASS=$(grep TEST_PASS tests/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) cypress run
